definition: A small, nocturnal mammal with wings that is commonly associated with darkness and often depicted in folklore and literature. It is known for its ability to fly and navigate in the dark using echolocation.

examples.german: Die Fledermäuse fliegen in der Nacht.
Fledermäuse orientieren sich mit Hilfe von Ultraschall.
Fledermäuse sind die einzigen Säugetiere, die fliegen können.
examples.english: Bats are the only mammals that can fly.
